QueryList.Query: FROM UserInfo A WHERE 1=1 <#if id??> <#if like??> and A.id like '%'||:id||'%' <#else> and A.id=:id </#if> </#if> <#if authority??> <#if like??> and A.authority like '%'||:authority||'%' <#else> and A.authority=:authority </#if> </#if> <#if status??> <#if like??> and A.status like '%'||:status||'%' <#else> and A.status=:status </#if> </#if> <#if openid??> <#if like??> and A.openid like '%'||:openid||'%' <#else> and A.openid=:openid </#if> </#if> <#if reallyName??> <#if like??> and A.reallyName like '%'||:reallyName||'%' <#else> and A.reallyName=:reallyName </#if> </#if> <#if idCardImage??> <#if like??> and A.idCardImage like '%'||:idCardImage||'%' <#else> and A.idCardImage=:idCardImage </#if> </#if> <#if idCard??> <#if like??> and A.idCard like '%'||:idCard||'%' <#else> and A.idCard=:idCard </#if> </#if>
